title: Rewterz Threat Advisory Multiple Google Chrome Vulnerabilities

sentences: Google Chrome could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a use-after-free in Ozone. By persuading a victim to visit a specially crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service condition on the system.
Impact

sentences: Google Chrome could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a use-after-free in Sharing. By persuading a victim to visit a specially crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service condition on the system.
